HOME.TITLE: Registration System for JISIC
HOME.NAMESMSG: * The name can only contain letters and is required
HOME.LASTNAMESMSG: * The Last names can only be letters and is required
HOME.PHONEMSG: * The phone can only contain numbers and is required
HOME.EMAILMSG: * Email must be correct and is required
HOME.IDENTIFICATIONMSG: * Identification can only be numbers, must have 10 digits and is required
HOME.PASAPORTEMSG: * Passport can only be letters, numbers and is required
HOME.REGLA1: By registering for an event from the list below, you are already registered for the JISIC, if you register for more than one, you are subject to having incremental payments.
HOME.REGLA2: The registration of EPN Students, External Students will be checked by our staff and if there is any inconsistency, their registration will be rejected.
HOME.REGLA3: Before confirming your registration, please make sure you have selected all the required registrations.
HOME.REGLA4: If you have any problems or concerns regarding the JISIC, contact us at the email jisic@epn.edu.ec, including your personal data.
